ipDeptAgent.name: IP Dept Agent
ipDeptAgent.ability:
Place up to 1 stun counter on an adjacent card. 
Threat ⇒ Place 1 additional stun counter.
ipDeptAgent.flavorText: Justice is not blind; it is a high-resolution optical sensor.

tacticalAgent.name: Tactical Agent
tacticalAgent.ability: Act: SС battlefield: Destroy SС if it has aim or an threat.
tacticalAgent.flavorText: Efficiency is the sincerest form of intimidation.

patrolAgent.name: Patrol Agent
patrolAgent.ability: T: When this card gives points, you may move it to any free cell.
patrolAgent.flavorText: They say the city never sleeps. We make sure it doesn't even blink.

riotAgent.name: Riot Agent
riotAgent.ability:
Push an adjacent card 1 cell. Мay take its place. 
Support ⇒ Place 1 counter counter on that card.
riotAgent.flavorText: Gatherings of more than two people are prohibited!

threatAnalyst.name: Threat Analyst
threatAnalyst.ability:
Р: Cards with your exploit counter do not give points to opponents. 
Support ⇒ Exploit. Threat ⇒ Exploit.
threatAnalyst.flavorText: Gatherings of more than two people are prohibited!

recklessProvocateur.name: Reckless Provocateur
recklessProvocateur.ability: Push an adjacent card 1 cell. Мay take its place. If it is a Threat. ⇒ Provocation.
recklessProvocateur.flavorText: 'Come a little closer,' he whispered. 'I\'ve got a surprise for you.'

dataLiberator.name: Data Liberator
dataLiberator.ability:
P: Cards with your exploit counters give you points.
Support ⇒ Exploit.
dataLiberator.flavorText: Information doesn't want to be free. It needs to be.

cautiousAvenger.name: Cautious Avenger
cautiousAvenger.ability:
Destroy the selected card with an aim counter.
Support ⇒ Aim.
cautiousAvenger.flavorText: Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art.

vigilantSpotter.name: Vigilant Spotter
vigilantSpotter.ability:
Each opponent reveals 1 card to you. 
T: Support ⇒ When an opponent plays the revealed cards, get 1 point.

inventiveMaker.name: Inventive Maker
inventiveMaker.ability: Place the Recon Drone card in a free adjacent cell.

faber.name: Faber
faber.ability: Place the Walking Turret card in a free adjacent cell.
faber.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

censor.name: Censor
censor.ability:
Threat ⇒ Exploit.
Swap any exploit counters for stun counters.

princeps.name: Princeps
princeps.ability:
Destroy the selected card with threat.
Support ⇒ Shield 1.
princeps.flavorText: Order is not requested. It is imposed.

immunis.name: Immunis
immunis.ability: Return an Optimate card from the discard pile to your hand.

centurion.name: Centurion
centurion.ability: Return a command card from the discard pile to your hand.

codeKeeper.name: Code Keeper
codeKeeper.ability: Cards with your Exploit counter provide support to your cards and cannot pose a threat to them.
codeKeeper.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

devoutSynthetic.name: Devout Synthetic
devoutSynthetic.ability:
Push an adjacent card 1 cell. May take its place.
Support ⇒ Destroy.
devoutSynthetic.flavorText: Flesh is a bug. The Signal is the patch.

unwaveringIntegrator.name: Unwavering Integrator
unwaveringIntegrator.ability:
Support ⇒ Exploit.
Gain 1 point for each of your Exploit tokens.

signalProphet.name: Signal Prophet
signalProphet.ability:
Move a card with your Exploit counter to a free cell in the row.
Support ⇒ Stun.

zealousMissionary.name: Zealous Missionary
zealousMissionary.ability:
Exploit on each card with Threat.
Support ⇒ Exploit.

overwatch.name: Overwatch
overwatch.ability: Aim. Each opponent reveals 1 card to you. If a player reveals an command card, you may draw 1 card.

repositioning.name: Tactical Maneuver
repositioning.ability: Move your card to a free cell in the row. If the card moved to support, then take 2 cards.

mobilization.name: Mobilization
mobilization.ability: Gain points in any diagonal, +2 for each of your support in it.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.ability: Remove any opponent's counters from your card. This card uses its ability.

dataInterception.name: Data Interception
dataInterception.ability: Exploit. Reveal 1 card from any opponent for each exploit counter you have on the battlefield. If at least one command card is revealed in this way, draw 2 cards.

reconDrone.name: Recon Drone
reconDrone.ability: P: When a command is played, you may move this card to any free cell.
